content.raw: That's a good idea.  So far, we're not generating a `.cmake` file with Gazebo (which we eventually should), but we are generating a `.pc` file (which is how drcsim and other users are finding Gazebo at configure time), and we can get Gazebo's install prefix from there.  I'll revise this pull request today to do it that way.
